Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
February 2024 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Greetings, fantastic team! Welcome to the latest installment of The Justia Insider! In this edition, you will find Justia's most recent updates, milestones, and insights into the workings behind the scenes. As we embark on a new month, let's align our collective focus on our objectives. February brings new prospects for collaboration, innovation, and success. Wishing you all a month filled with love, laughter, and remarkable achievements!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Short Videos (Legal Content). We recently produced and uploaded a new short video discussing Teleworkers’ Rights and Obligations under Mexican Law on our Justia YouTube Channel.

Justia Mexico Portal Content Updates. We have recently enriched our portal's growing collection of updated laws by updating the content of the General Law of Commercial Companies, Income Tax Law, Public Security System Law, and National Code of Criminal Procedures.

QA Automation Team. We've enhanced our web accessibility libraries to include ADA Compliance checks in our automated QA reports. Moreover, our system now enables seamless interaction with Google Docs, offering a more user-friendly interface for QA reports.

Justia Portal. We've launched a new Justia subdomain, car-accidents.justia.com, which will serve as the dedicated hub for all of our car accident consumer content.

Justia Mexico Portal. We’ve been working tirelessly to strengthen and maintain the content on our Justia Mexico Portal, ensuring it remains up-to-date. This month, we've published pages on ISR Law, Commercial Companies Laws, the National Public Security System General Law, and the Penal Procedures Code.

IT Team. This month, we accomplished several IT operations, including a mass upgrade to our application databases infrastructure, a security enhancement for some of our Legacy Elevate Websites, and various server maintenance tasks.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Justia Mexico Portal. We have added four new legal centers: the Environmental Law Center, Human Rights Center, Constitutional Law Center, and Election Law Center.
  • Justia in the Media. The content on our portal has been cited as a source of consultation by El Financiero and SDP Noticias, two of the largest media and press companies. Additionally, influencers have referenced our content on their podcasts.

  • Fair Housing. We conducted comprehensive research on fair housing laws to compile a 50-state survey featured in the Home Ownership and Landlord-Tenant Law Centers. This survey outlines the protections against discrimination in each state.
  • Taxes for Remote Workers. We crafted content for the Tax Law Center detailing the tax obligations of individuals working in a state different from their residence—a scenario that has become increasingly prevalent since the onset of the pandemic.y outlines the protections against discrimination in each state.
  • AI Case Summaries. We enhanced our prompts for generating case summaries to align with the latest advancements in large language models set to be released this spring.

Justia Pet News

Golden Boy Devo

Say hello to my best boy, Devo! He is 13 years old, but he's pretty spry for his old age. He's about 60 lbs and is a Puggle (Pug + Beagle) Shar-Pei mix. Mutts are the best! His name at the shelter was "Hunter", and in his younger days, he was a pretty good one. He is very smart and loyal and stays by my side day and night.

— Lauren Moskie

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Cesar Zarate

Intern / Help Desk

Hello there! I'm Cesar Zarate, an (almost) computer systems engineer. My coding journey began with the dream of becoming a game developer. However, as I delved deeper into the expansive realm of software development, I uncovered a passion for web development. Along the way, I've had the privilege of working with incredibly talented individuals and gaining valuable experience. I'm excited to join Justia and contribute, fostering mutual growth for us all!

upcoming holidays

Dates to Remember
Mexican Constitution
February 5th


Constitution Day takes place in Mexico on the first Monday of February, regardless of the date. On this day, people commemorate the anniversary of Mexico's current constitution, which was promulgated on February 5th, 1917.

Upcoming Events

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Society of the Snow

Available on Netflix

This film unveils the harrowing true tale of the 1972 plane crash in the Andes Mountains. On board were members of the Uruguayan rugby team from the Old Christians Club of Montevideo, who bravely battled against adversity. Astonishingly, some of them endured for 72 days following the tragic incident. Their survival was a testament to their collective teamwork, leadership, problem-solving prowess, unwavering faith, perseverance, emotional intelligence, respect, and dedication to a shared objective. These survivors impart profound lessons that resonate not only with humanity but also with the business world.

— Claudia Duque

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Antonio Gonzalez, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Genaro Osoria, Haydee Garcia, Jorge Contreras, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Omar Carreon, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
